quoteText: Warning: After you have deactivated your account or left the Services, questions may still appear on the Services, but will be anonymized and no longer associated with you directly (in other words, a question you asked on your friendâ€™s profile will still be visible, but will not include your username).
title: This service will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information

tosdr.case: This service will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information
